WBHRB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 5018 Staff Nurse Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 07, 2025, 16:54 IST
 West Bengal Health Recruitment Board
 5,018 Jobs |  Posted On : 07-Aug-2025 |  West Bengal |  Salary : 20,000 to 45,000




FOLLOW

The West Bengal Health Recruitment Board (WBHRB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 5018 Staff Nurse Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.Sc Nursing, GNM can apply for the WBHRB Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in West Bengal.

WBHRB Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Staff Nurse	5018	B.Sc Nursing, GNM

WBHRB Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 40 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

WBHRB Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on

Written Test.
Interview.

WBHRB Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

WBHRB Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 20,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 45,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the WBHRB Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the WBHRB Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	13-08-2025
Closing date	03-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
